name: Action Responder
description: ActionResponder is a tool designed to streamline the process of generating responses to trademark office actions. It's like having a high-quality paralegal at your disposal; fast, efficient, and cost-effective. This application guides you through the entire process, from initial case lookup to the final response generation, saving you hours of drafting time.

name: Musical Journeys
description: Musical Journeys is a project that creates a music genre classification machine learning model, gives song recommendations based on what song you classify and suggests a place to visit where others have a similar taste in music.

name: Weather Database
description: Project that scrapes the National Weather Service website daily, makes data transformations, stores the data and creates a historical database over time.

name: Crime Analysis
description: Project that processes major city crime data in the United States and generates visualizations through charts and maps.

name: Airline Data ETL
description: Project demonstrating the use of data modeling prior to processing data with ETL pipeline.

name: Quality of Life
description: Project that analyzes global quality of life data and generates visualizations through charts and maps.

name: Dice Roller Game
description: A fun Python dice roller application that uses ASCII diagrams for visualizations. Deployed to web for user interactivity with Flask.

name: Air Quality Index
description: Project that takes air quality data from 2 cities in China and demonstrates the use of an ETL pipeline.

name: Spotify ETL
description: Using Python Pandas to perform an ETL pipeline on spotify data.
